website_summaries.verdict: An ideal transfer pump to move hazardous liquids to and from a tank or barrel.
pros: Comes with a tank or barrel mounting
Intended to transfer flammable liquids such as gasoline, diesel, and kerosine
cons: Pump is fairly specific to 55 gallon drums, requiring some to make modifications for other uses
Hose is too long for uses other than 55 gallon drum

customer_reviews.title: You got to know what you're buying.
customer_reviews.text: At first this pump worked for ten minutes, and jammed, Contacted GreatCircle, USA, they sended me the parts needed to fix it. I know, I know, could ask for a refund, but a good friend of mine, wich happens to be a chemical industrial mechanic told me this pump can be fixed, that it is reliable, He said two things" before it's first use ( break-in period), has to be primed with diesel or silicone lubricant abundantly, and before assembly of the spare parts, the rotor, inside housing and pump cover, all has to be polished". The manufacturer doesn't tell you this in it's owner's manual. I did what he told me, and the pump is working with no hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good looking quality pump
customer_reviews.text: Good looking quality pump. Heavy. Suction tube is too long to fit my 45 gal tank that's 22 inches high, standard pick-up tank. Have to find an adapter that should've been included in the packaging anyway. Update. The fittings on the suction tube appear to be pressed/glued on. They are threaded and glued though. You can switch the fitting on the tubes and just use the bottom section of it's too long as mine was. I couldn't find an adapter anywhere to fit the fine threads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pump and nozzle set!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pump and nozzle set! Unfortunately, it comes with some of the worst directions imaginable! Do yourself a favor, buy this, but only keep the directions for the parts list! Don't bother reading them! Just watch the assembly video they have posted for it down in the information section. Once you've watched the video it is very easy to assemble! Works great! I bought 2 of them, one for gas and one for diesel on the farm. So much better than a hand pump!
customer_reviews.author: Longbow1

customer_reviews.title: Worked 4 or 5 times
customer_reviews.text: Now it's dead. There is s short somewhere, but it's not in the wiring which has bad insulation from that factory (broken inside of the switch housing), the switch or anywhere else obvious so it's probably a bad rotor. I'm not even sure how much time this is worth diagnosing, as everything I look at in more detail just leads to finding other poor quality and construction that is sure to make it stop working in the future. $250 and it pumped about 25 gallons. Because I bought it in November and don't need much fuel over the winter it's been too long to return it, so I guess that's a lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl G. Jurbala

customer_reviews.title: This is a 12volt pump and should come with battery clips but it doesn’t.  It also has no filter.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to fuel up my utility tractor. I put it on a 275 gl tank for diesel. I’ve only used it once, but it worked perfectly the first time. I had read some reviews that said the water-block filter bowl leaked, so I used just a dab of ky jelly on the gasket and didn’t lose a drop. I did put a different suction tube because the one that came with it was too short for the oval-shaped tank. Keep the tube 2-3 inches off the bottom of the tank. The hose is nice and flexible, but you’ll want to add a swivel between it and the pump so it doesn’t kink at that point.
customer_reviews.author: Ed D.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged wiring, leaked right from the start.
customer_reviews.text: While installing the pump I found the wiring in both compartments within the switch housing to be damaged. Was going to just tape it up and run it, upon pumping the first three gallons I had fuel pouring out of the pump housing. Only contact info I'm finding for the company is overseas. Will update if I'm able to warranty it painlessly.
customer_reviews.author: KLil

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Worked well with 12 volt battery power supply. The telescoping fuel pick-up is very nice. I added a swivel for optimum fuel dispensing. Its also nice to add a fuel meter which is handy feature. Added quick disconnects to both ends of hose so that unit could be stored in original package for the winter.
customer_reviews.author: 50 Grit

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this pump based largely on the customer service you can expect to receive if you have any issues with it. I had an issue with my pump (internal electrical connections), but I do not expect every mechanical device to always perform flawlessly anyway. To my surprise, I was sent a replacement pump at no charge. This product is a great value, and with a seller that stands behind it like this, I can't see any reason not to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Solid Orange

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works...just doesn’t work long!
customer_reviews.text: This pump worked fine for 7 months. Then it began to loose it’s prime. It is mounted on the bed of my Ram and only was used for my tractor/backhoe. Although I cannot be exactly accurate on gallons pumped before they want me to buy another one....it is fair to say it survived to pump around a 1,000 gallons. Unfortunately I didn’t buy insurance.. I will not be replacing it with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: 2ManySecrets

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item for the fuel transfer use, the flow rate is high for fast transferring. The pump is heavy duty, and with all needed parts for installatoin easily. So far the pump works stable and very well.
customer_reviews.author: Antony

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy one.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but problems! I've pump less than 100 gallons with it and I'm already planning to replace it with a GPI the suction tube just fell off of it and dropped down in my tank I've had to mess with the wiring 3 times it wouldn't seal up until I took it to a pump shop and had it rethreaded its cost me almost twice what a good pump would cost JUNK
customer_reviews.author: Turd Fergison

customer_reviews.title: very effective
customer_reviews.text: The start up of liquid flow is a little choppy but within about 5 seconds it settle down. Its a very convenient tool. We bought a power supply for the unit separately. It would be nice if the unit had one as part of the system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pump works great
customer_reviews.text: The pump is good, the nozzle leaked diesel all over the bed of my truck. It bleeds through the nozzle and also leaks at the swivel
customer_reviews.author: Tony conte

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Moves fuel fast. Pump motor seems kinda loud but this is the first one I've owned so I have nothing to compare it to. They may all be that way. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Stickdog

customer_reviews.title: Very good pump
customer_reviews.text: The pump works good I pump 100 gallons of diesel every day through this pump for 2 years now still going strong
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product
customer_reviews.text: This unit is piece of junk. Worked for 100 gallons worth of pumping and then quit. The motor magnets came loose. I fixed them, but the switch, after less than two years of light use, has corroded and broken.
customer_reviews.author: Neal C. Foley

customer_reviews.title: First use was great and now it barely pumps.
customer_reviews.text: Had the pump for less than a month. First use was great and then it barely pumped. Customer service worked with me for a replacement. Hopefully this was an isolated incident. Looking forward to putting the new replacement to work. Update 7-25-18: CS has been diligent in resolving this matter. Replacement pump received and to date no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice little pump for the money
customer_reviews.text: No longer worried about the heating oil delivery getting up to the shop. Have my own transfer tank on the 4WD. This is a nice little pump/rig for the money. Built pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: JCDinMountJoy

customer_reviews.title: NO LEAKS!
customer_reviews.text: QUALITY PUMP WITH FAST FLOW RATE. THE PUMP WAS VERY EASY TO ASSEMBLE. BEING CSA CEFTIFIED GAVE ME THE FELLING OF ADDED SAFETY, WHICH IS AT THE TOP OF MY MUST HAVE LIST. NO LEAKS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Started out fine. Barely pumps after only a month and a ...
customer_reviews.text: Started out fine. Barely pumps after only a month and a half of use
customer_reviews.author: George Tibbetts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to install and working as advertised. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Good handy product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Does exactly what we need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: David King

customer_reviews.title: but after a few modifications it works great.
customer_reviews.text: Pump shaft was to long for the 45 gallon tank that was supposed to mate with, but after a few modifications it works great.
customer_reviews.author: james cramp

customer_reviews.title: My own diesel fuel station for my Ranch
customer_reviews.text: This is the best investment ever, I have heavy machines and fill up in a jiffy, super investment, quick and safe. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: dionys

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: My husband was extremely happy with his Christmas gift. There was needed replacement of pump and company took care of everything.
customer_reviews.author: RMF

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Had a little problem with the pump but the took care of the situation everythings good
customer_reviews.author: Javier R.

customer_reviews.title: Unit works fine
customer_reviews.text: Unit came to me with broken wires. I fixed it my self. Didn't have time to return unit. Unit works fine now. Company read review sent me replacement parts for what came in broken.
customer_reviews.author: Dider1

customer_reviews.title: Replacement nozzle. 👍
customer_reviews.text: The pump seems to work fine but the fuel nozzle does not shut off and the only way was to shut it off manually. After a few attempts to get a replacement nozzle I did receive 2 nozzles, one of which was an automatic shut off nozzle. I'm very happy now.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Fuelworks fuel pump
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic Made in America Thank you American Well worth the money Well made
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but nozzle size.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pump with a fast flow rate. Down side is the nozzle does not fit standard automotive unleaded gasoline filler hole. Had to purchase a different nozzle to fit my vehicles. I would've expected a unit made for gasoline to fit standard unleaded vehicle gas tank filler. If it had I would've given it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: M.D.B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: pumps fuel and is much quieter than the ones painted red.
customer_reviews.author: cherri

customer_reviews.title: ... have little problem but they exchange it working very good
customer_reviews.text: i have little problem but they exchange it working very good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Fuelworks 10305708A 12V 15GPM Fuel Transfer Pump Kit with 14' Hose, Extensible Suction Tube and Manual Nozzle, Black
